name: Owned: List all enabled users with an email address

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {owned:true, enabled:true}) WHERE exists(u.email) RETURN u

name: Owned: List all owned user group membership
Owned: List all enabled users not members of privileged groups

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u:User {owned:true, enabled:true})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE (NOT g.objectid ENDS WITH $domain_admins OR NOT g.objectid ENDS WITH $enterprise_admins OR NOT g.objectid ENDS WITH $administrators OR NOT g.objectid ENDS WITH $account_operators) RETURN p

name: Owned: List all enabled users members of privileged groups

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u:User {owned:true, enabled:true})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE (g.objectid ENDS WITH $domain_admins OR g.objectid ENDS WITH $enterprise_admins OR g.objectid ENDS WITH $administrators OR g.objectid ENDS WITH $account_operators) RETURN p

name: Owned: List all enabled users that can RDP

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer {owned:true}) RETURN c ORDER BY c.name

name: Owned: Find all group membership routes with dangerous rights over group

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u:User {owned:true, enabled:true})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g1:Group)-[r:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|GenericWrite|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|GenericWrite|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword|AdminTo]->(g2:Group) RETURN p ORDER BY g1.name

name: Owned: Route owned user where group membership has dangerous rights over user

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u1:User {owned:true, enabled:true})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g1:Group)-[r:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|GenericWrite|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|GenericWrite|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword|AdminTo]->(u2:User) RETURN p ORDER BY g1.name

name: Owned: Route from owned user to all nodes with 'Unconstrained Delegation'

queryList.query: MATCH p=(o {unconstraineddelegation: true, enabled: true})<-[r]-(u:User {owned:true, enabled:true}) RETURN p

name: Owned: Find all owned user with privileged access to Azure Tenancy (Required: azurehound)
Owned: Find all owned user where group membership grants privileged access to Azure Tenancy (Required: azurehound)
Owned: Find all Owners of Azure Applications with Owners to Service Principals with Dangerous Rights (Required: azurehound)
Owned: Find all owned groups that grant access to network shares

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u:User {owned:true})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) where (any(prop in keys(g) where g[prop] contains '\\')) return p

name: Owned: [DANGEROUS!!!] Find all Dangerous Rights from owned

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer), (u1:User), (g:Group), (gp:GPO), (co:Container), (ou:OU) WITH collect([c, u1, g, gp, co, ou]) AS t WITH t AS results UNWIND results AS results_2 UNWIND results_2 AS result MATCH p=(u2:User {owned:true})-[r:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword|AdminTo]->(result) RETURN p

name: Owned: Route all sessions to computers WITHOUT LAPS (Required: sessions)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u:User {owned:true})<-[r:HasSession]-(c:Computer {haslaps:false}) RETURN p ORDER BY c.name

name: Owned: Route all sessions to computers (Required: sessions)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u:User {owned:true})<-[r:HasSession]-(c:Computer) RETURN p ORDER BY c.name
